newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch bonds leap late as EMU stability pact agreed.
newsitem.headline: Dutch bonds leap late as EMU stability pact agreed.

text.p: 1800 GMT - Dutch bonds leap at close as EU heads reach accord on EMU stability pact. Bonds track bunds closely. Rapid flattening of curve after steepening in morning. * 6.25 July 1998 +0.03 to 104.18/28, for 3.46 pct bid yld. * Sept 2001 +0.14 to 116.56/66, bid yld 4.76 pct v 4.79 pct on Thursday. * Jan 2006 +0.25 to 101.30/40, bid yield 5.81 pct vs 5.85 pct. * 10-yr yld spread vs April 2006 bund steady at -6 basis points. * Jan 2023s +0.44 to 111.24/44, 6.59 pct yield vs 6.62 pct. Spread under bunds steady at -19 bp.
